name: Pytheas
summary: GeoJSON Serializer and Deserializer for MapKit and GoogleMaps
description:
GeoJSON Serializer and Deserializer for MapKit and GoogleMaps.
You can deserialize all GeoJSON features and feature collections directly or in a geometry.
You can serialize points, lines and multipolygons, but not multipoints, multilines or multipolygons.
100% tested.
